contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of July, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The matter is REMANDED to the Court of Common Pleas, Mercer County, for further proceedings consistent with this Court’s opinions in Jacobs v. Halloran, 551 Pa. 350, 710 A.2d 1098 (1998) and Marino v. Hackman, 551 Pa. 369, 710 A.2d 1108 (1998).
